verbose_text: In fact, Schu S4 can tolerate the loss of one of its two FPI loci (targeted deletions of regions encompassing FTT_1699-FTT_1715 or FTT_1344-FTT_1360), without substantial loss of virulence toward mice infected by the intradermal route (A. Sjostedt and W. Conlan, unpublished).
evidence: loss of one of its two FPI loci
